briefdescription.para: Gets or sets the maximum height of the dropdown.
Gets or sets the first visible ComboTreeNode in the drop-down portion of the control.
Gets the number of ComboTreeNodes visible in the drop-down portion of the control.
Removes extraneous default padding from the dropdown.
Gets the collapsed (+) glyph to paint on the dropdown.
Gets the expanded (-) glyph to paint on the dropdown.
Initialises a new instance of ComboTreeDropDown and associates it with its parent ComboTreeBox.
Displays the dropdown beneath its owning ComboTreeBox control.
Scrolls the drop-down up or down by the specified number of items.
Regenerates the items on the dropdown.

detaileddescription.para: This method is called whenever a significant change occurs to the dropdown, such as a change in the tree or changes to the layout of the owning control.

briefdescription.para: Registers the arrow keys as input keys.
Updates the status of the dropdown on the owning ComboTreeBox control.
Prevents the clicking of items from closing the dropdown.
Updates the font on the items when the drop-down's font changes.
Handles keyboard shortcuts.
Handles keyboard shortcuts.
Handles the expand/collapse of nodes and selection in response to the mouse being clicked.
Handles scrolling in response to the left mouse button being clicked.
Terminates dragging of the scrollbar in response to the mouse returning to the control.
Terminates dragging of the scrollbar in response to the mouse leaving the control.
Handles dragging of the scrollbar and hot-tracking in response to movement of the mouSE.
Disengages dragging of the scrollbar and handles hot-tracking in response to the mouse button being released.
Paints the drop-down, including all items within the scrolled region and, if appropriate, the scrollbar.
Draws the glyph.
Generates a bitmap to display beside the ToolStripItem representation of the specified node.
Determines how to draw a scrollbar button.
Returns the ComboTreeNodeCollection to which the specified node belongs.
Determines all of the parameters for drawing the bitmap beside the specified node.

detaileddescription.para: If they represent a unique combination, the bitmap is generated and returned. Otherwise, the appropriate cached bitmap is returned.

briefdescription.para: Determines how to draw the main part of the scrollbar.
Determines how to draw the down arrow on the scrollbar.
Determines how to draw the up arrow on the scrollbar.
Determines how to draw the 'thumb' button on the scrollbar.
Scrolls the drop-down so as to ensure that the highlighted item is at either the top or bottom of the scrolled region.
Updates the items in the scrolled region.

detaileddescription.para: This method is called whenever the scroll offset is changed.

briefdescription.para: Handles the Tick event of the scrollRepeater control.

parameterdescription.para: The EventArgs instance containing the event data.

briefdescription.para: Represents the dropdown portion of the ComboTreeBox control.

detaileddescription.para: The nodes are displayed in a manner similar to the TreeView control.
